scripts.clean: npm run clean_tmp & npm run clean_prod & npm run clean_dev
scripts.test: npm run unit_tests && npm run e2e_tests
scripts.uglify_js: node scripts/uglify-js.js tmp/app.min.js app/**/*.js !app/lib/**/* !app/**/*.spec.js tmp/ngTemplates.js & node scripts/uglify-js.js tmp/lib.min.js app/lib/**/*.js
scripts.copy_js_dev: node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js app/**/*.js !app/lib/**/* !app/**/*.spec.js tmp/js & node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js app/lib/**/*.js tmp/js/lib
scripts.checksum_js: node scripts/checksum.js tmp/app.min.js & node scripts/checksum.js tmp/lib.min.js
scripts.inject_js_prod: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp lib.*.min.js && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp app.*.min.js
scripts.inject_js_dev: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp js/lib/*.js && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app js tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp js/*.js
scripts.uglify_css: node scripts/uglify-css.js tmp/app.min.css tmp/css/*.css & node scripts/uglify-css.js tmp/lib.min.css app/lib/**/*.css
scripts.copy_css_dev: node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/css/**/* tmp/css2 && node node_modules/rimraf/bin.js tmp/css && node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/css2/* tmp/css && node node_modules/rimraf/bin.js tmp/css2 && node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js app/lib/**/*.css tmp/css/lib
scripts.checksum_css: node scripts/checksum.js tmp/app.min.css & node scripts/checksum.js tmp/lib.min.css
scripts.inject_css_prod: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp lib.*.min.css && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp app.*.min.css
scripts.inject_css_dev: node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js lib css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp css/lib/*.css && node node_modules/front-end-dependency-inject/index.js app css tmp/html/index.html tmp/html/index.html tmp css/*.css
scripts.prep_html_prod: npm run compile_jade && npm run ng_templates
scripts.prep_js_prod: npm run lint_js && npm run test && npm run uglify_js && npm run checksum_js && npm run inject_js_prod
scripts.prep_css_prod: npm run compile_sass && npm run autoprefix && npm run uglify_css && npm run checksum_css && npm run inject_css_prod
scripts.copy_prod: node node_modules/cpy/cli.js tmp/html/index.html tmp/*.min.js tmp/*.min.css dist & npm run copy_images_prod
scripts.copy_dev: node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/html/index.html dev & node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/html/* !tmp/html/index.html dev/html & node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/css/* !tmp/css/lib dev/css & node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/css/lib/* dev/css/lib & node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/js/* !tmp/js/lib dev/js & node scripts/cpy-wrapper.js tmp/js/lib/* dev/js/lib & npm run copy_images_dev
scripts.prod: npm run clean & npm run bower && npm run prep_html_prod && npm run prep_js_prod && npm run prep_css_prod && npm run copy_prod && npm run clean_tmp
scripts.build_dev: npm run clean & npm run bower && npm run compile_jade && npm run compile_sass && npm run copy_css_dev && npm run copy_js_dev && npm run inject_js_dev && npm run inject_css_dev && npm run copy_dev && npm run clean_tmp
